import { useState, useE } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import * as BooksAPI from "./BooksAPI"; const ReadStatus = ({ books, setBooks }) => { const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); const shelves = [ { key: "currentlyReading", title: "Currently Reading" }, { key: "wantToRead", title: "Want to Read" }, { key: "read", title: "Read" }, ]; useEffect(() => { const handleShelfChange = async (event, bookToUpdate) => { const newShelf = event.target.value; try { const updatedBook = await BooksAPI.update(bookToUpdate, newShelf); const updatedBooks = books.map((book) => book.id === updatedBooks.id ? { ...book, shelf: newShelf } : book ); setBooks(updatedBooks); } catch (error) { console.error("Error updating book shelf: ", error); } }; }, [books]); return (

MyReads

{shelves.map((shelf) => (

{shelf.title}

    {books .filter((book) => book.shelf === shelf.key) .map((book) => (
  1. {book.title}

    Author: {book.authors}

    2. ))}
))}
Add a book
); }; ReadStatus.propTyoes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired, onDeleteBook: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default ReadStatus; /* import React from "react"; const ReadStatus = ({ onSearch }) => { const books = [ { title: "To Kill a Mockingbird", author: "Harper Lee" }, { title: "Ender's Game", author: "Orson Scott Card" }, // ... other book data ]; return (

); }; export default ReadStatus; */
